msbt.message: Ahhdon't you just feel like the rain is washin' away everything bad in the world? I know some folks don't really like the rain, but that's just<10_4 /> I don't even know what that is!
Doesn't matter to me if it's rainin' cats, dogs, or frogs I'm gonna do what I wanna do!
You ever thought about puttin' syrup on snow and tryin' to eat it?What? Me either!
When it rains a lot, you can hear it comin' down, so there's no surprise.But when it snows? <10_4 />BAM! You have no idea. It really sneaks up on you!
Ahh, looks like another perfect day for doin' laundry.If it gets any hotter, I might try fryin' some eggs on the concrete too. You wanna stop by for eggs?
So what's the deal with the weather today? Is it gonna rain? Is it gonna shine? I ain't got time for ambiguity!

Watch your eyes if you go runnin' through one of those cherry-blossom storms that're swirlin' everywhere. Because you know that if you get a blossom petal in your eye, a new tree will sprout from it, right? That's what my grandpappy told me, and it's what I tell every youngster to scare 'em. Gahaha!
So you're the wakeful sort too?<10_4 /> Well, this is some great weather for stayin' out late, so lucky us!
Soakin' up sunshine is nice and all, but there's nothin' like moonlight for makin' a guy feel comfortable.
Even the little things are twice as fun at night! , midnight snacks are the best!
Most mornings it's a struggle to drag my sorry carcass out of bed.Probably somethin' to do with my havin' been up and doodlin' around all night instead of sleepin' in bed.
I'm no good with newfangled gizmos, but smartphones are kinda handy.Still, you kiddos need to look up from your screens sometimes and look where the heck you're goin'!
May not care much about how I look, but I do try to keep clean. I don't need anyone sayin' I'm stinky.
Be honest, Is it obvious that I'm goin' gray?Guess I should face facts, but a guy likes to think he's still vital, y'know?
You know, on days like this
Just feel like I wanna sing! ♪ Ribbit, ribbit! ♪
Feel like stayin' inside. Maybe just work on some DIY or somethin'.
I know this island better'n anyone! Wanna hear about the best walkin' route you can take?<10_4 /> Sure you do! Let me see, on a day like this
It's perfect weather for takin' a stroll along the beach!
Try doin' a lap around the island! Sun won't be in your eyes today
Since it's so gloomy, you might wanna try walkin' over to our Resident Services. It's a good day to pop inside there, and maybe work on a DIY project
Tough to find your way around with everythin' all covered up, but you can still follow the surf on the beach.Just be careful not to fall in, OK?
The sky's pretty clear today, don't you think, kiddo? Could be a great night for stargazin'.
The weather's been pretty nice today, don't you think?I didn't say this, but tonight could be a real good night for watchin' the stars
Hey! We got a good old-fashioned rainbow goin'! Did you see it?Gettin' to see a rainbow after some rain is like gettin' dessert after eatin' your brussels sprouts!
Whoa, would you look at that? It's a double rainbow!Never thought I'd see one with my own two eyes.Waitthere are two rainbows, right? It's not just that I'm seein' one with each eye?
Sky is clearcheck. It's colder than an icicle's unclecheck.I just get the feelin' that we might could have ourselves a pretty special aurora tonight, kiddo

You see that aurora, kiddo? Is that not the most miraculousuh miracle you've ever seen? Ah, don't mind me. I'm just lost in theuhmiraculous nature of nature , I guess words fail me at times like this.
Is that you, ?<10_4 /> Can't be too sure in all this fog
Don't go sittin' under a tree in this weather or you have a great, big shock comin' to you! Gahaha!
Hey! Did you see the shootin' star?It's not every day you get to see one of those, kiddo.You can wish on 'em, you know. First thing I'd wish for? More shootin' stars! Gahaha!
Feels like you can see every star in the sky tonight!YepI'm in the mood to sit back with a nice glass of and just watch the heavens.
You make a wish on one of those shootin' stars yet, kiddo?Just look up at the sky usin' , press  when a star goes by, and wish away, .No foolin'! Would lie to you?
